name: Ali
reviewTitle: The Model 3 Performance is everything in one. It is fast, it is quiet and comfortable; very comfortable seats actually.

name: Arman
reviewTitle: The performance version is incredibly quick and for the money there's no other car on the road that will come speeds.

name: Tushar
reviewTitle: Car rides well but unfortunately the Tesla service is severely lacking. No one answers the service call.

name: Asif
reviewTitle: Tesla is fabulous at putting these cars together! My car was delivered with very little human intervention and get an instant price and delivery date.

name: Anik
reviewTitle: This car never fails to surprise me, it's out of this world. I highly recommend taking one of these for a test drive, you will not be disappointed.

name: Oney
reviewTitle: I just love this car. It is the most reliable car that I have ever owned. Purchased for a 100 mile a day commute Could not have made a better choice especially.
